title: Welcome to the blog!
content:
Here, i'll document some of my loudspeaker builds during and after construction. As ive done many builds prior to this blog going live, i'll document them in the first couple of posts. The build range from 2022 to present day.

The first real build i did was a pair of compact bookshelf speakers, these were built with 'Amazon special' drivers and an off the shelf crossover, I constructed the cabinets after running the numbers through some basic online calculators... no winISD at this time. I didnt even have the TS params for the 4 inch fiberglass drivers... But they sounded OK, i tweaked the port a couple of times and even though i didnt do the maths proper, i was impressed by the sound. At least i constructed the solid fonts from walut strips and the finish was great for my first build.
